info.name: EPITECH - Flat Dark Intranet
info.description: A flat dark design for our intranet. What else to say ?
info.additionalInfo: This style requires the Epitech - Flat Intranet ( https://userstyles.org/styles/136022/epitech-flat-intranet ) to be installed as it overrides its colors. This theme is still a work in progress. Features will be added over time. Feel free to take this style and improve it, but don't forget to give me credits for that. Also use the CC BY-NC-SA license, cuz if you don't I'll cry...a lot. :(
